entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries over southern sections overnight. Amount 4 cm over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind light except southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
